Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor: Extract isolated column components to reduce flickering

- Create centralized app-store.js for state management \(similar to OpenTUI''s
  dirty region tracking pattern\)
- Extract LeftColumn component \(Progress, Goals, Tickers, Projects\)
- Extract RightColumn component \(Portfolio, Trading History, Wealth\)
- Extract AppFooterBar component \(Tier, View Mode, Shortcuts\)
- Add useAppStore hook for components to subscribe to specific state slices
- Add useStoreSync hook to bridge existing useState to the store
- Fix ShimmerState to manage its own tick subscription \(isolates animation
  re-renders from parent panel\)

This architecture change means:
- Each column subscribes only to the data it needs
- Updates to one column don''t trigger re-renders of other columns
- The shimmer animation only re-renders the ShimmerState component,
  not the entire AgentActivityPanel

Inspired by OpenTUI''s approach: double buffering, dirty region tracking,
and isolated component updates.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
